org.forum.api.controller

Class MessageController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forum.api.controller.MessageController

  • @CrossOrigin(origins="${spring.origin.cors}")
 @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/api/message")
public class MessageController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class defines REST API for manipulating messages entries.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MessageController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message create(Message message)
      Maps all POST requests to base url and creates message entry in database with parameters from specified Message data model which is returned after it is created.
      void deleteById(java.lang.Long id)
      Maps all DELETE requests to base url/id and deletes message entry in database based on specified id.
      MessageBody getBodyById(java.lang.Long id)
      Maps all GET requests to base url/id and returns MessageBody data model representing body of message based on specified id from database.
      java.util.List<MessageHeader> getHeaderList()
      Maps all GET requests to base url and returns list of MessageHeader data models representing message header with corresponding id.
      Message updateById(java.lang.Long id, Message message)
      Maps all PUT requests to base url/id and updates message entry in database based on specified id with parameters from specified Message data model which is returned after it is created.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getHeaderList

        @GetMapping
public java.util.List<MessageHeader> getHeaderList()
        Maps all GET requests to base url and returns list of MessageHeader data models representing message header with corresponding id.
        Returns:
        list of MessageHeader data models

      • getBodyById

        @GetMapping(value="/{id}")
public MessageBody getBodyById(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                           java.lang.Long id)
        Maps all GET requests to base url/id and returns MessageBody data model representing body of message based on specified id from database.
        Parameters:
        id - id of message body to get
        Returns:
        MessageBody data model

      • create

        @PostMapping
 @ResponseStatus(value=CREATED)
public Message create(@RequestBody
                                                                     Message message)
        Maps all POST requests to base url and creates message entry in database with parameters from specified Message data model which is returned after it is created.
        Parameters:
        message - Message data model to create in database
        Returns:
        Message data model

      • updateById

        @PutMapping(value="/{id}")
public Message updateById(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                      java.lang.Long id,
                                                      @RequestBody
                                                      Message message)
        Maps all PUT requests to base url/id and updates message entry in database based on specified id with parameters from specified Message data model which is returned after it is created.
        Parameters:
        id - id of message to update
        message - Message data model to update in database
        Returns:
        Message data model

      • deleteById

        @DeleteMapping(value="/{id}")
public void deleteById(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                      java.lang.Long id)
        Maps all DELETE requests to base url/id and deletes message entry in database based on specified id.
        Parameters:
        id - id of message to delete
